version_description:
- Fixed a number of crashes for Sorting, Custom Collections, Database Search, and much more
- Vastly improved the speed of the Filter feature
- Updated the FAQ to better answer some questions
- Updated third party components to fix various issues
- Fixed some issues with single and double quotes
- Added some missing device information for customer support e-mails
- Increased the timeout length for network calls for larger collections
- Fixed an issue where fields with multiple value were not getting saved correctly
Fixes for some iOS 12 crashes

- Fixed multiple crashing bugs
- Updated a number of components for improved usability and performance

- Fixes a problem where users were seeing a progress dialog that wouldn't ever disappear.
- Fixes some crashes.

- Sped up the loading of large collections
- Users can now create up to 30 fields with Custom collections
- Added a Quantity field option for Custom collections
- Collection Value now takes Quantity into account with calculating
- Added a Refresh Collection option
- Add ability for users hide lists not being used on Switch tab
- Added the option of exporting Main list, Wishlist or both
- Add new devices (iPhone XR, XS, XS Max, new iPads) to device list
- Added Tape as a Media Type for Video Games
- Added sorting by Season for Movies / TV type
- Database search by Actor, Director, and more now working
- Sorting by Comic number now works properly.
- Restoring an in-app purchase now works better
- Added code to prevent users from getting double-charged
- Personal Rating field is no longer misaligned on Info view on iPhone 8
- Filter banner is now visible when searching collection
- Fixed a few crashes
- Fixes two crashes

- Fixed a few issues with web image searching
- Fixed a number of other smaller bugs
- Minor fixes for some crash tracking.
- Fixed a bug where some items weren't saving because of a problem with international dates.

- Fixed a bug with Personal Rating not showing up on the main list when doing a custom collection
- Fixed a bug with sorting by Authors with Books
- Fixed some issues with saving certain items
- Added the Dimensions field to the Art type
- Fixed a bug with Estimated Value
- Fixed a bug when filtering by Audio for Movies
- Fixed a sorting issue with Comic issue numbers
- Added Type of Magazine to Magazines collectible
- We now trim leading and trailing spaces from Title
- Added the ability to purchase the Mac app
- Added new genres for Books
- Added Clamshell Case for Packaging to Movies
- Added new genres to Music
- Fixed Video Games genres list
- Changed Year field so only a year was selectable
- Fixed an export issue with the Currency field
- Added new Video Game platforms
- And even more minor fixes!
Minor bug fix on the Switch tab.
Fix for a crashing bug

- Fixed a crashing bug related to restoring collection.
- Fixed a bug where filtering by Notes was not working.
- Fixes for three different crashes.
- Bug fix for when data was getting duplicated in custom collections.
A number of fixes for iOS 13.

- Added more information about imports.
- Fixed the text layout so that it is shown properly on smaller devices.
- Added logging to track down crashes.
Fixes a crash on the main list.
- Changes to how collections are loaded to fix some crashes.

- Fixed a number of crashes
- Fixed sorting
- Added the ability to search beyond just Title
- Fixed some data duplication issues with Custom collections
- Added a number of new options to various fields throughout the app
- Fixed an issue with picture saving and display

- Fixed a number of crashes
- Fixed some filtering issues with Author
- Fixed a login issue in the Import section
Fix crashes
iOS 13 crash fixes
- Fixes a bug where the theme in the app was always red. Now it defaults back to blue.

- The Star Wars category is now known as the Sci-Fi category
- Fixed a bug when users log in to Cloud Sync
- Fixed a crashing bug with customs collections
- Added and updated various messaging
- Updated a number of third-party components for better stability
- Fixed a bug where field updates weren't getting sent down from the server properly

- Fixes a crash with web image search.
- Fixes some other small bugs.
- Fixes some issues with purchases

- Fixed a configuration problem where crashes weren't properly reported.
- Updated some components to fix bugs.

- Fixes a crash in web image search
- Fixed the maintenance mode dialog from appearing when it isn't supposed to
- Updated some third-party components to fix bugs

- Added better messaging about features
- Minor bug fixes

- Added Stamps as a collectible type
- Added the ability to insure your collections in the top left menu (United States only)
- Updated some components to fix bugs

- Added the German language for native speakers.
- Many small fixes.
Fixes a problem where images weren't saving properly.

- Fixed some issues with image display and saving.
- Fixed a bug when saving some custom collections.
- Fixed a bug when slash (/) was in the name of a custom collection.
- Fixed a bug where custom collections were disappearing after deleting a field.
- Updated some third-party components for stability.

Bugfix release:

- iOS 14 related fixes.

- Sped up and reduced calls to the server. The app should now load, and switch between collectible types, faster than ever.
- Small bug fixes in a number of behind-the-scenes areas.
More crash fixes

- Fixed the Reload Collection button.
- Fixed a bug where sometimes the progress wheel wouldn't disappear.
- Fixed a couple of crashes related to image saving.
- Added in new third-party API calls to various sources so almost every barcode displays at least some data.
- EAN+5 comics and ISSN EAN+2 magazines now pull out correct issue information. 
- Puts the last 2 digits of a magazine barcode into the "issue" field automatically.
- We also no longer pull out issue info on ISBN +5 barcodes starting with 97 that are scanned as a comic.
- Updated the FAQ.
Fixes two crashes related to images for collectibles.

- Fixes a problem where Custom collections weren't 
- Fixes a crash that could happen when scanning in some items in the Music category.
- Fixes two potential crashes related to image saving.

- Fixed certain number fields (like year, runtime, etc) from saving for some new items.
- Fixed a rare crashing bug.

- Fixes a bug with the delete images button (trash can) not working in the UI.
- Fixes a crash that could occur in some fields that display checkmarks.
- Added Platform for some Video Games API calls.
- Made some changes and put in some logging to try and fix a crash on the Edit Info view.
- Fixes a crash when removing temp images.

Bugfix release:

- Fixes a bug where new comic books not starting in barcode number 97 would get stuck in an endless loop.
- Invalid barcodes can no longer be entered on the manual entry dialog.
- Fixed a theming bug on the web image search.
- Now showing the correct numeric keyboard across all collection types for barcode entry.
